member.name: T:MyDatastructure.Sorting.TopAndBottomSort`1
member.summary:
A better version of Top K sort, it find the top and bottom N-k, k element from a list of comparable, it will also remember the min and the max too, on average, close to O(N log(K)) performace.
It will not modified the original structure.
